name: hit or miss
description:
You miss 100% of the notes you don't hit. Listen to the music, and aim to perfection!

DESCRIPTION

hit or miss is a simple rhythm game where players have to tap the correct buttons as the flying bars overlap with the input area. 

This game is submitted to CSUI Individual Game Jam 2020 and uses the following diversifier:

  • Power Of Sound (Sound effect and music is a part of the core gameplay)
    • As it is a rhythm game, the music will help players getting the correct timing to press the buttons.
  • For the first time in forever (Interactive tutorial)
    • The game provides players with a tutorial mode so the players can get the hang of the controls.
  • Dentuman (Implementing SFX)
    • Before the game starts, there'll be a countdown with a ticking timer notifying players that the game is about to start. Successful hits will also let out a SFX.

CONTROLS

  • Left mouse button to interact with the menu
  • Z to hit the blue bars
  • X to hit the red bars
